text: Wu-Tang Clan is a hip-hop group from USA. They formed in Staten Island, New York in 1992. As a group, they debuted in 1993 with their first album Enter the Wu-Tang (36 Chambers). GZA started the group. ==Members== ===Current=== * Ghostface Killah * GZA * Inspectah Deck * Masta Killa * Method Man * Raekwon * RZA * U-God ===Past=== * Ol' Dirty Bastard (deceased) ===Sometimes=== * Cappadonna (he has appeared on some albums as an official member) ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Enter the Wu-Tang (36 Chambers) (1993) * Wu- Tang Forever (1997) * The W (2000) * Iron Flag (2001) * 8 Diagrams (2007) * A Better Tomorrow (2014) * Once Upon a Time in Shaolin (2015) ==References== ==Other websites== * Wu-Tang Clan Website * Wu-Tang Name Generator Category:Hip hop bands Category:1990s American music groups Category:1992 establishments in New York (state)
title: Wu-Tang Clan
